verses.roman:
yadyapi ei śloke āche pañca alaṅkāra
ei pañca-doṣe śloka kaila chārakhāra

synonyms: yadyapi—although; ei śloke—in this verse; āche—there are; pañca—five; alaṅkāra—literary embellishments; ei pañca-doṣe—by the above-mentioned five faults; śloka—the verse; kaila—has been made; chārakhāra—spoiled.
translation: "Although there are five literary ornaments decorating this verse, the entire verse has been spoiled by these five most faulty presentations.
